shared.model

Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.Building
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    City, Settlement

    public abstract class Building
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Class that holds information about Game Pieces These are Settlements or Cities and not Roads Settlements and Cities inherit from this class They have a color to link them to their player They have a location on a vertex of the map These attributes cannot be changed once set
